mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STCS.TRANS_RECORD T INNER JOIN STCS.TRANS_RECORD_REBACK A ON A.MSG_ID = T.MSG_ID WHERE A.ORIGIN_MSG_ID = #{originMsgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.STATUS ='EXCEPTION'

SELECT SUM(A.REBACK_AMT) REFUND_AMT FROM STCS.TRANS_RECORD T INNER JOIN STCS.TRANS_RECORD_REBACK A ON A.MSG_ID = T.MSG_ID WHERE A.ORIGIN_MSG_ID = #{originMsgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.STATUS IN ('SUCCESS', 'EXCEPTION')
SELECT BALANCE, USABLE_AMT FROM STCS.ACCT_SEVEN_BUSS B, STCDB.TD_CUST_INFO U WHERE B.CUST_ID = U.CUST_ID AND U.MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
